caption.text: My entry in the inaugural Loucas-Bosha Staddon-Shewry Rosebery-Nourse three-lasagne invitational, as photographed cold the next day: behold its handsome strata of Mediterranean Wholesalers’ fresh pasta ($3.99/500g), lamb ragù made from Istanbul Butchery shanks, shoulder and bone-in curry meat, and a besciamella is made on milk with mace and pepper infused into it. There’s pecorino Romano and Reggiano on top, and I finished the ragù with green olives, finely chopped celery, rosemary and a couple of capers. Matty Hirsch helped me buy Chinon and King Valley gamay to go with it. #moreismore
